name: yellow-flute
effect: Used on a party Pokémon in battle : Cures confusion.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A flute made from yellow glass that snaps Pokémon out of confusion.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A flute made from yellow glass that snaps Pokémon out of confusion.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A flute made from yellow glass. It snaps Pokémon out of confusion.
